resources.string:
"Turn 'ON' the switch on the top right. ↗️⊙.⊙↗️ With accessibility authorization, you'll get the best typing experience on different apps!
Note: You may receive a system reminder about authorizing, Emoji Keyboard will NEVER collect ANY of your information."
Meu teclado personalizado feito com o #%1$s https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartkeyboard.emoji
Customize your own keyboard with your favorite pictures! Download #%1$s For Free: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartkeyboard.emoji

Você precisa experimentar o app %1$s. Você pode personalizar seu teclado com suas próprias fotos! E as ⒻⓄⓃⓉⓈ e os emojis são incríveis. Baixe o #%2$s agora grátis: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartkeyboard.emoji
